name: SCP - Chaos Containment
description:
This Game Is based on the NTF Mod and SCP - Security Stories    

SCP - Chaos Adventures Is a Game Where you play as chaos insurgency against the threads in the facility you will have to complete a lot of tasks but always watch your back there can be something waiting for you 

The first demo will only have the multiplayer i cant work that fast on the story 

So How to download the download is quit complicated so do it step by step slowly if you need help join the discord 

The Game is not Released Yet im planing to release it in june or july

Step 1 install the game 

Step 2 extract it (i would recomend 7 Zip)

Step 3 Add SCP - Nine Tailed Fox Mod to you steam libary https://store.steampowered.com/app/1304510/SCP_NineTailed_Fox/ reason for that is that the games Muliplayer servers runs on this game  

Step 4 keep Steam open or else it will say Steam API not found 

Step 5 Congrats now you only need to start the .exe in the file

https://discord.gg/4Ksr8rsZ6K
